perturbation.original_text: Sandler O'Neill accepts such appointment and agrees to use its best efforts to assist the Company with the solicitation of subscriptions and purchase orders for Securities in accordance with this Agreement; provided, however, that the Agent shall not be obligated to take any action which is inconsistent with any applicable laws, regulations, decisions or orders.
perturbation.changed_text: Sandler O'Neill accepts such appointment and agrees to use commercially reasonable efforts to assist the Company with the solicitation of subscriptions and purchase orders for Securities in accordance with this Agreement; provided, however, that the Agent shall not be obligated to take any action which is inconsistent with any applicable laws, regulations, decisions or orders.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires 'best efforts,' which legally means the highest standard of effort. Changing this to 'commercially reasonable efforts' significantly lowers the required standard, making the agent's obligation less stringent and creating a contradiction on the level of committment.

By changing 'any and all loss, liability, claim, damage and expense whatsoever, as incurred, related to or arising out of the Offerings' to 'any and all loss, liability, claim, damage and expense directly related to or arising out of the Offerings' introduces a directness of causation requirement. The original text doesn't exclude losses that are indirectly related. This means the company is now indemnifying a narrower set of losses, creating conflicting interpretations of the scope of indemnification.

perturbation.original_text: The Company will use its best efforts to effect and maintain the listing of the Common Stock on the Nasdaq Global Market and, once listed on the Nasdaq Global Market, the Company will comply with all applicable corporate governance standards required by the Nasdaq Global Market. The Company will file with the Nasdaq Global Market all documents and notices required by the Nasdaq Global Market of companies that have issued securities that are traded in the over-the-counter market and quotations for which are reported by the Nasdaq Global Market.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company will use commercially reasonable efforts to effect and maintain the listing of the Common Stock on the Nasdaq Global Market and, once listed on the Nasdaq Global Market, the Company will endeavor to comply with all applicable corporate governance standards required by the Nasdaq Global Market. The Company will file with the Nasdaq Global Market all documents and notices reasonably required by the Nasdaq Global Market of companies that have issued securities that are traded in the over-the-counter market and quotations for which are reported by the Nasdaq Global Market.
perturbation.explanation: The initial obligation to use 'best efforts' is replaced with a lower standard of 'commercially reasonable efforts.' Furthermore, the absolute requirement to 'comply' is softened to 'endeavor to comply.' And 'required' to 'reasonably required'. These alterations introduce significant ambiguity and weaken the company's commitment to maintaining the listing and complying with governance standards. This creates a contradiction in the commitment to adhere to Nasdaq regulations.
